summary: This makes it possible to marry Serana after completing Quest Kindred Judgement and advising Serana's mother Valerica that it's safe to return.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ee8800][size=4][b]Requires - Latest Skyrim patch v1.9 + Dawnguard DLC [/b][/size][/color]
[line]
[center][img=]http://static1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/28685-1-1362727257.png[/img][/center]
[color=#FF0000][b][size=3]IMPORTANT:[/size][list][*]The Marriage prompt requires wearing the 'Amulet of Mara' after talking to Marmal about marriage and you can't already be married.
[/list][/b][/color]
Serana has retained all her original voice.

After Harkon's Death, notify Valerica that it's safe to return.
Once Serana's mother Valerica has returned to Castle Volkihar, Serana will have dialogue asking 'Do you have thing on your mind'. (Note Valerica doesn't return until you leave the soul cairn via the portal to her lab/study)
This will allow the normal Vanilla Skyrim marriage options using the amulet of Mara.

[b][u]Included in this mod.[/u][/b][list]
[*]Dialogue which will appear to change Serana's attributes making her marriable.
[*]Fully voiced from parts of her existing dialogue.
[*]Spouse Merchant ability and daily gold.
[*]She will be able to provide a home cooked meal daily.
[*]Includes a summon spell for her.
[*]Dialogue to set home at these preset locations:
[i] ** Locations won't appear unless they are purchased or related quests completed.
- Breezehome (Whiterun)
- Honeyside (Riften)
- Vlindrel Hall (Markarth)
- Hjerim (Windhelm)
- Proudspire Manor (Solitude)
- Archmage Quarters (Winterhold College)
- Nightingale Hall (Thieves Guild)
- Dawnstar Sanctuary (Dark Brotherhood)
- Jorrvaskr (Companions)
- Sky Haven Temple (Blades)
- Volkihar Keep
- Fort Dawnstar
- Lakeside Manor (Falkreath Hold) (Requires HF plugin)
- Heljarchen Hall (The Pale) (Requires HF plugin)
- Windstad Manor (Hjaalmarch) (Requires HF plugin)
- *Option to set any other location to a custom home. [/i][*]Fast Travel to set home location through Serana's Dialogue.
[/list]

[color=#ee8800][b]Recommended Mods:[/b][/color]
Unofficial Skyrim Patch - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19[/url]
Unofficial Dawnguard Patch - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23491]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23491[/url]
Unofficial Hearthfires Patch - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25127]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25127[/url]

Thanks to FlashbangNeedsBackup for doing this walkthrough, though it's a little dated it still relevant on the procedure to take.

[center][youtube]X4jnDIcBFQk[/youtube][/center]
[color=#ee8800][b]I can be contacted on Discord underÂ [/b][/color]C0d3rM0nk3y Nathan#6832
author: C0drm0nk33

files.name: NMM AIO
files.changelogHtml: Completely Rebuilt and Overhauled the mod.

files.name: Marriable Serana AIO Version 1_5_1
files.changelogHtml:
Possible fix to Serana's missing follower option
Change made to Soul Cairn entrance to attempt to fix re-entry bug
Modified script properties for missing Hearthfire locations in Main File.
Fixed 'What do you need?" dialogue.

files.name: Marriable Serana AIO v1-5-2
files.changelogHtml:
Serana now kinda has Spouse merchant dialogue (Still WIP.)
Summon Spell added for Serana for rare cases where she bugs out(vanishes) or gets stuck in her AI pathing.
Improved workaround for Serana follow bug. When MentalModel variables are incorect a dialogue prompt will appear within the Lets talk branch to correct this.

files.name: Marriable Serana AIO v1_5_3
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed Soul Cairn re-entry bug (This has been tested as best as I could)
Fixed bug in my Mod load Alias causing some update checks to fail.
Added workaround to Initial dialogue not appearing

files.name: Marriable Serana AIO v1_5_5
files.changelogHtml:
Small fixes to marriage scene.
Fixed missing dialogue to set home.
Modified Serana Summon spell, new spell effect and changed from lesser power to greater once a day power.

files.name: Marriable Serana AIO v1_6_2
files.changelogHtml:
Modified Initial dialogue conditions
Forced Dialogue to combat issues with it not appearing when some other mods were involved
Sanboxing added for all Vanilla homes
Added HF adoption scripts (Experimental - sometimes works.) More permanent fix being worked on
Cleaned up some scripts and conditions to increase cross mod compatibility.
Modified Summon Serana spell to fix graphical glitch of Transparent Serana on some casts.
Fixed Serana Store to show proper shop contents when viewing.
Initial scripts and dialogue setup for setting Serana's Outfit (Activated in next release once bugs worked out.)
Updated AIO NMM Installer

files.name: Marriable Serana Non-NMM v1_6_2
files.changelogHtml:
Modified Initial dialogue conditions
Forced Dialogue to combat issues with it not appearing when some other mods were involved
Sanboxing added for all Vanilla homes
Added HF adoption scripts (Experimental - sometimes works.) More permanent fix being worked on
Cleaned up some scripts and conditions to increase cross mod compatibility.
Modified Summon Serana spell to fix graphical glitch of Transparent Serana on some casts.
Fixed Serana Store to show proper shop contents when viewing.
Initial scripts and dialogue setup for setting Serana's Outfit (Activated in next release once bugs worked out.)
Updated AIO NMM Installer
